title: The Life and Death of a Pair of Jeans
itunes:title: The Life and Death of a Pair of Jeans
description:
Maxine Bédat, Founder and Director of the New Standard Institute, discusses her book "Unraveled: The Life and Death of a Garment" about the human and environmental costs of fashion fashion.

Host: Carol Massar. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
